thread.title: Banksy’s “Bomb Hugger” Graffiti Is Getting Its Own Exclusive Figure
thread.title_full: Banksy’s “Bomb Hugger” Graffiti Is Getting Its Own Exclusive Figure

author: Marcus Cho
title: Banksy’s “Bomb Hugger” Graffiti Is Getting Its Own Exclusive Figure
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Shortly after Banksy had his infamous “Monkey Sign” design immortalized in the form of a Medicom figure , STUDIO PERFECT has released a new figure inspired by his “Bomb Hugger” graffiti.
Fans of Banksy’s art will be more than happy to find that the 320mm figure is nearly an exact replica of the graffiti, while the only true departure from the original is the figure’s grey monotone color scheme.
The STUDIO PERFECT Bomb Hugger figure is set to launch for a retail price of approximately $428 USD, and is now available for pre-order .
Figures are set to ship out in May.
